attributes.action: Stop the government moving us closer to the EU without a general  election
attributes.additional_details: This is a very important topic that is going to effect everyone in this country and personally I think the public should have a say on  any of the decision made especially after we the voters were the one's who voted to leave .
attributes.background: We had a referendum on Brexit that wasn't fully implemented and now they want closer ties without the British people voting on this

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. It's unclear which policies in particular the public would be voting on.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
